author: Keiko Morris
title: Brookfield Plans Retail Reboot on Bleecker Street
text:
The stretch of Manhattan’s Bleecker Street between Bank and Christopher streets is pockmarked with “for lease” signs, a casualty from the collision of the retail industry’s upheaval and skyrocketing rents.
But for Brookfield Property Partners LP, this is the land of opportunity. The global real-estate developer and investor closed a deal to acquire four retail properties with seven storefronts on Bleecker Street.
